newsitem.title: USA: 3 D Systems to acquire Keltool Inc.
newsitem.headline: 3 D Systems to acquire Keltool Inc.

text.p: 3D Systems Corp said Wednesday it entered into a definitive agreement to acquire the assets of Keltool Inc of St. Paul, Minn.
Keltool produces steel tooling for plastic injection molding machines based on a patented process and involving 3D Systems' rapid phototyping systems.
The purchase price will be $1.737,000. In addition, Keltool will be issued a warrant to buy 50,000 shares of 3D Systems common stock at an exercise price of $14.75 per share.
In connection with the acquisition, Wayne Duescher, the sole Keltool stockholder, will enter into a five-year agreement not to compete.
